info.name: IY-MART-BE
info.description: Backend API for Product, Stock, Order and Notification systems of YT MART web backend system developed by Laravel

query.description: can only search one product based on it's ID
can search a product if the exact name has been given
can search based on exact uniuque slug for the item
can filter based on the category (filter)
can filter exact product list that belongs to a brand (filter)
can search based on spesific search quary that effect on product name, description, brand, taxonomy and brand. (filter)
can filter products based on taxonomy conbination
